plot: In 1916 Romanian Army lieutenant Tudor Gheorghiu possessed by a strong love for his young beautiful wife and obsessed with her apparent infidelity finds himself in a contest for her love against gigolo lawyer Nicolau.
title: Ultima noapte de dragoste
plot_es: In 1916 Romanian Army lieutenant Tudor Gheorghiu possessed by a strong love for his young beautiful wife and obsessed with her apparent infidelity finds himself in a contest for her love against gigolo lawyer Nicolau.
plot_en: In 1916 Romanian Army lieutenant Tudor Gheorghiu possessed by a strong love for his young beautiful wife and obsessed with her apparent infidelity finds himself in a contest for her love against gigolo lawyer Nicolau.
